tool_description: Generates compelling opening statements, questions, or scenarios to capture audience attention from the start.

hook_style.description: Type of opening: question, story, statistic, quote, scenario, challenge

audience_type.description: General audience category: professional, academic, general public, students, peers

tone_preference.description: Desired opening tone: serious, humorous, inspiring, provocative, warm

error_messages: Topic too vague: Provide a specific speech topic for relevant hook creation
Invalid hook style: Must be one of [question, story, statistic, quote, scenario, challenge]
Invalid audience type: Must be one of [professional, academic, general public, students, peers]
Invalid tone preference: Must be one of [serious, humorous, inspiring, provocative, warm]
usage: Enter speech topic, preferred hook style, and audience type. Optionally specify tone preference for customized opening options.

hook_explanation.description: Why this hook works for the topic and audience
